snippet.title: The Subject - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the official trailer for The Subject, releasing November, 30th 2018.

Visit The Subject on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/855190/The_Subject/

You can play the pre-launch demo right now on IndieDB! Check it out:
https://www.indiedb.com/games/the-subject/downloads/the-subject-pre-launch-demo
